DOC.brief_summary: The investigators perform this study to evaluate the effects of caudal Dexmedetomidine (DEX) added to high volume/low-concentration of ropivacaine in children undergoing orchiopexy.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Dexmedetomidine on the Characteristics of High Volume/Low Concentration Ropivacaine in a Caudal Block in Pediatrics
DOC.criteria: children undergoing ambulatory orchiopexy, ASA status I mental retardation, developmental delay, neurological or psychiatric illness, coagulation disorder, spinal anomalies
